text: Christopher Frederick Showerman (born June 24, 1971) is an American actor and comedian. He is best known for playing George in George of the Jungle 2, taking over from Brendan Fraser. ==Other websites== * Official site * * Interview for "The Land That Time Forgot" * Actors Life * Shorrisfilm.com Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:Actors from Michigan Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors
title: Christopher Showerman
